public.aboutContent: I'm a 25 year old Canadian who's currently set up shop in Taiwan. I've previously worked in San Francisco at AppDynamics as a Solutions Engineer. Now, I'm working on some projects, while improving my Chinese.
public.contactContent: If you would like to get in touch please send me an email - it's daniel dot arrizza at gmail.com
public.officeContent:
My office is currently located in Taipei, Taiwan.
Come visit me for beers or 芒果冰 (mango and shaved ice).
